explains: n. 开始，开端；序曲，开始部分；早期，初期；发端，起源
v. 开始，着手（begin 的现在分词形式）
wordGroup: at the beginning 首先；从一开始；起初；从头开始
at the beginning of 在……的开始
from beginning to end 自始至终
from the beginning 从一开始；从开始到现在；从开始一直
in the beginning 开始，开端；起初
from the very beginning adv. 从最初开始（首先）
at the very beginning 最初；就在刚刚开始；在刚开始的时候；起初；在一开始

sentences.en: Her sight is beginning to go.
His skin was beginning to blister.
The cheese was beginning to sweat.
